ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p: Come help us build the next generation cloud platform to support internet services across Apple. Our server engineering team develops and deploys software which forms the foundation for some of our most exciting services, including iCloud, Maps, iTunes, and more.

ul.li: Have a good grasp of Linux systems, networking and security
Have a thorough understanding of cloud based architectures
Working experience with Java is highly desired (or Python or other languages)
Experience with REST API, databases and/or key-value systems
Experience in CI build tools such as Gradle and Jenkins a plus
Experience implementing and administering logging, telemetry and monitoring tools
Know how in maintaining and debugging systems in Java runtime environment

div.p: PIE Coordination SRE team provides reliable distributed coordination service for PIE services and other services at Apple. We are seeking an experienced Site Reliability Engineer to join a small, highly skilled team. The person should be able to build and deploy software, analyze logs and telemetry data for issues. Apply good software development methodology in writing automation code. While working experience with Java is highly desired, what is more important is the ability to quickly become proficient in any language, and solid grasp of the fundamentals of Unix systems, service-oriented architectures, and cloud services. Provide on-call support for critical services.
BS in computer science or equivalent experience
